name: Ride Forever
description:
This is a part of my "Bored Games" series, I make random games/experiences to learn new code or just a stupid idea that comes to mind.

Story: Thought I would make my own Unity version, test out the HDRP and PostProcessing Stack again.

Background Theme by Serge Narcissoff | https://soundcloud.com/sergenarcissoff
Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com
